backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling user profiles, admin roles, and CRUD operations for properties with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with a features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Properties, Inquiries, and Admin pages wrapped by SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: UI panel for granting and revoking admin access using principal IDs with mutation feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: Helper component explaining bootstrap admin behavior and showing the user's principal with copy support.
frontend/src/components/auth/HomepageAut: Authentication button that toggles login/logout using Internet Identity and clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Displays the user's principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: Displays business name, address, and phone using icons and data from siteData.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Landing page hero section with marketing text, contact buttons, and imagery.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: Inquiry submission form with frontend validation and simulated success handling.
Renders a list of inquiries with user details, interest, and message content.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Contact and social links bar with compact and default display modes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing business info, contact details, hours, and branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, business branding, compact contact bar, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Global site layout wrapper including header, outlet content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/properties/Inlin: Provides an inline form for creating or editing a property, supporting image uploads, YouTube video URLs, and chunked video uploads.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Displays a property with images, video handling, and admin edit/delete actions, switching to an inline edit form when editing.
Modal-based property editor allowing title, price, location, description, and image updates with simple file/url handling.
Image carousel component with navigation, load error handling, and indicator dots.
Renders a grid of PropertyCards or an empty-state message, passing admin update/delete actions when allowed.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Defines the Property interface, business info, social links, and seed property data for initial rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend admin diagnostics and environment context, handling fallbacks and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides grant and revoke admin mutations with error normalization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoPlayba: Loads a video blob's direct streaming URL and manages loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Handles video upload from bytes with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Returns an empty inquiries list since backend support is removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Syncs a React state value with localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Provides queries and mutations for listing, creating, updating, and deleting properties.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches admin status using available backend methods with identity-based refetching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard handling authentication, admin checks, diagnostics, and inquiry management with multiple UI states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying hero content, business highlights, and an inquiry section.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Page showing a standalone inquiry form with basic layout and title setup.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Manages property listings with admin-only create/update/delete flows and inline forms.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Guide explaining how to migrate site content, business info, and properties to Google Sites.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines simple frontend-only types for user profiles and inquiries.
frontend/src/types/propertyVideo.ts: Defines property video type variants and logic for detecting YouTube, uploaded, or none.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts image files to data URLs with validation and size checks.
frontend/src/utils/icError.ts: Normalizes IC canister errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/videoFileToDataUrl.ts: Reads video files as data URLs without size limits for chunked upload handling.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Utility functions to extract YouTube video IDs from various URL formats and convert them into embeddable URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking schema version, adminâ€‘related feature requests, and project metadata.
